name: desk-outlook-addin
description: Outlook add-in for opening emails in Desk

scripts.start: npx office-addin-dev-certs install && npx office-addin-debugging start manifest.xml
scripts.deploy: cd .. && git subtree split --prefix=outlook-addin/src -b addin-deploy && git push addin-origin addin-deploy:main --force && git branch -D addin-deploy
